;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)

;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;

                  bin2bcd_int PROC

                  bcd2lcd_zero PROC
;;;51     void bcd2lcd_zero(char sig)
000062  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;52     {
;;;53     char i;
;;;54     zero_on=1;
000064  4ded              LDR      r5,|L1.1052|
000066  f04f0101          MOV      r1,#1
00006a  7029              STRB     r1,[r5,#0]
;;;55     for (i=5;i>0;i--)
00006c  f04f0105          MOV      r1,#5
;;;56     	{
;;;57     	if(zero_on&&(!dig[i-1])&&(i>sig))
000070  4be9              LDR      r3,|L1.1048|
;;;58     		{
;;;59     		dig[i-1]=0x20;
000072  f04f0620          MOV      r6,#0x20
000076  f04f0700          MOV      r7,#0                 ;54
                  |L1.122|
00007a  782a              LDRB     r2,[r5,#0]            ;57  ; zero_on
00007c  b142              CBZ      r2,|L1.144|
00007e  185a              ADDS     r2,r3,r1              ;57
000080  f8124c01          LDRB     r4,[r2,#-1]           ;57
000084  b924              CBNZ     r4,|L1.144|
000086  4281              CMP      r1,r0                 ;57
000088  d902              BLS      |L1.144|
00008a  f8026c01          STRB     r6,[r2,#-1]
00008e  e007              B        |L1.160|
                  |L1.144|
;;;60     		}
;;;61     	else
;;;62     		{
;;;63     		dig[i-1]=dig[i-1]+0x30;
000090  eb030201          ADD      r2,r3,r1
000094  f8124d01          LDRB     r4,[r2,#-1]!
000098  f1040430          ADD      r4,r4,#0x30
00009c  7014              STRB     r4,[r2,#0]
;;;64     		zero_on=0;
00009e  702f              STRB     r7,[r5,#0]
                  |L1.160|
0000a0  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1              ;55
0000a4  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;55
0000a6  2900              CMP      r1,#0                 ;55
0000a8  d1e7              BNE      |L1.122|
;;;65     		}	
;;;66     	}
;;;67     }             
0000aa  bdf0              POP      {r4-r7,pc}
;;;68     
                          ENDP

                  int2lcd_mmm PROC

;;;181    	     }
;;;182    	else 
;;;183    	     {
;;;184    	     s[i]=s[i]+0x30;

;;;185    	     zero_on=0;

;;;186    	     simb_num++;

;;;187    	     }
;;;188    	 }
;;;189    	          
;;;190    if(minus=='-')

000124  d104              BNE      |L1.304|
;;;191         {
;;;192         s[simb_num++]=minus;

;;;193         }    
;;;194    if(des)

;;;195         {

;;;197              {
;;;198              s[i]=s[i-1];

;;;199              }
;;;200         s[des]='.';

;;;201         simb_num++;

;;;202         }

;;;204    n=find(xy);

;;;205    for (i=0;i<simb_num;i++)

0002a2  5593              STRB     r3,[r2,r6]
0002a4  f1010101          ADD      r1,r1,#1              ;333
0002a8  b249              SXTB     r1,r1                 ;333
                  |L1.682|
0002aa  42a1              CMP      r1,r4                 ;333
0002ac  dbf6              BLT      |L1.668|
;;;336    	}
;;;337    }
0002ae  bdfe              POP      {r1-r7,pc}
;;;338    
                          ENDP

                  power_inc PROC
;;;339    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;340    unsigned int power_inc(unsigned int argument, char powerum)
0002b0  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;341    {
;;;342    unsigned int base,base_up,base_dn, digit;
;;;343    unsigned int med_dn,med,med_up;
;;;344    
;;;345    base = 0;
0002b2  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0
;;;346    if(powerum==0) base=1U;
0002b6  b191              CBZ      r1,|L1.734|
;;;347    else if(powerum==1) base=10U;
0002b8  2901              CMP      r1,#1
0002ba  d013              BEQ      |L1.740|
;;;348    else if(powerum==2) base=100U;
0002bc  2902              CMP      r1,#2
0002be  d014              BEQ      |L1.746|
;;;349    else if(powerum==3) base=1000U;
0002c0  2903              CMP      r1,#3
0002c2  d015              BEQ      |L1.752|
;;;350    else if(powerum==4) base=10000U;
0002c4  2904              CMP      r1,#4
0002c6  d016              BEQ      |L1.758|
;;;351    else if(powerum==5) base=100000U;
0002c8  2905              CMP      r1,#5
0002ca  d017              BEQ      |L1.764|
;;;352    else if(powerum==6) base=1000000U;
0002cc  2906              CMP      r1,#6
0002ce  d017              BEQ      |L1.768|
;;;353    else if(powerum==7) base=10000000U;
0002d0  2907              CMP      r1,#7
0002d2  d017              BEQ      |L1.772|
;;;354    else if(powerum==8) base=100000000U;
0002d4  2908              CMP      r1,#8
0002d6  d017              BEQ      |L1.776|
;;;355    else if(powerum==9) base=1000000000U;
0002d8  2909              CMP      r1,#9
0002da  d017              BEQ      |L1.780|
0002dc  e017              B        |L1.782|
                  |L1.734|
0002de  f04f0201          MOV      r2,#1                 ;346
0002e2  e014              B        |L1.782|
                  |L1.740|
0002e4  f04f020a          MOV      r2,#0xa               ;347
0002e8  e011              B        |L1.782|
                  |L1.746|
0002ea  f04f0264          MOV      r2,#0x64              ;348
0002ee  e00e              B        |L1.782|
                  |L1.752|
0002f0  f44f727a          MOV      r2,#0x3e8             ;349
0002f4  e00b              B        |L1.782|
                  |L1.758|
0002f6  f2427210          MOV      r2,#0x2710            ;350
0002fa  e008              B        |L1.782|
                  |L1.764|
0002fc  4a49              LDR      r2,|L1.1060|
0002fe  e006              B        |L1.782|
                  |L1.768|
000300  4a49              LDR      r2,|L1.1064|
000302  e004              B        |L1.782|
                  |L1.772|
000304  4a49              LDR      r2,|L1.1068|
000306  e002              B        |L1.782|
                  |L1.776|
000308  4a49              LDR      r2,|L1.1072|
00030a  e000              B        |L1.782|
                  |L1.780|
00030c  4a49              LDR      r2,|L1.1076|
                  |L1.782|
;;;356    
;;;357    base_up=base*10U;
00030e  eb020182          ADD      r1,r2,r2,LSL #2
000312  ea4f0441          LSL      r4,r1,#1
;;;358    base_dn=base/10U;
000316  f04f030a          MOV      r3,#0xa
;;;359    
;;;360    med_dn=argument%base;
00031a  fbb0f1f2          UDIV     r1,r0,r2
00031e  fb020511          MLS      r5,r2,r1,r0
;;;361    med=argument/base;
;;;362    med_up=argument/base_up;
000322  fbb0f4f4          UDIV     r4,r0,r4
;;;363    digit=med%10U;
000326  fbb1f0f3          UDIV     r0,r1,r3
00032a  fb031010          MLS      r0,r3,r0,r1
;;;364    digit++;
00032e  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
;;;365    digit%=10U;
000332  fbb0f1f3          UDIV     r1,r0,r3
000336  fb030111          MLS      r1,r3,r1,r0
;;;366    med_up*=10U;
00033a  eb040084          ADD      r0,r4,r4,LSL #2
00033e  ea4f0040          LSL      r0,r0,#1
;;;367    med_up+=digit;
000342  4408              ADD      r0,r0,r1
;;;368    med_up*=base;
000344  fb00f002          MUL      r0,r0,r2
;;;369    med_up+=med_dn;
000348  4428              ADD      r0,r0,r5
;;;370    return med_up;
;;;371    
;;;372    
;;;373    
;;;374    
;;;375    }
00034a  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;376    
                          ENDP

                  power_dec PROC
;;;377    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;378    unsigned int power_dec(unsigned int argument, char powerum)
00034c  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;379    {
;;;380    unsigned int base,base_up,base_dn, digit;
;;;381    unsigned int med_dn,med,med_up;
;;;382    
;;;383    base = 0;
00034e  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0
;;;384    if(powerum==0) base=1U;
000352  b191              CBZ      r1,|L1.890|
;;;385    else if(powerum==1) base=10U;
000354  2901              CMP      r1,#1
000356  d013              BEQ      |L1.896|
;;;386    else if(powerum==2) base=100U;
000358  2902              CMP      r1,#2
00035a  d014              BEQ      |L1.902|
;;;387    else if(powerum==3) base=1000U;
00035c  2903              CMP      r1,#3
00035e  d015              BEQ      |L1.908|
;;;388    else if(powerum==4) base=10000U;
000360  2904              CMP      r1,#4
000362  d016              BEQ      |L1.914|
;;;389    else if(powerum==5) base=100000U;
000364  2905              CMP      r1,#5
000366  d017              BEQ      |L1.920|
;;;390    else if(powerum==6) base=1000000U;
000368  2906              CMP      r1,#6
00036a  d017              BEQ      |L1.924|
;;;391    else if(powerum==7) base=10000000U;
00036c  2907              CMP      r1,#7
00036e  d017              BEQ      |L1.928|
;;;392    else if(powerum==8) base=100000000U;
000370  2908              CMP      r1,#8
000372  d017              BEQ      |L1.932|
;;;393    else if(powerum==9) base=1000000000U;
000374  2909              CMP      r1,#9
000376  d017              BEQ      |L1.936|
000378  e017              B        |L1.938|
                  |L1.890|
00037a  f04f0201          MOV      r2,#1                 ;384
00037e  e014              B        |L1.938|
                  |L1.896|
000380  f04f020a          MOV      r2,#0xa               ;385
000384  e011              B        |L1.938|
                  |L1.902|
000386  f04f0264          MOV      r2,#0x64              ;386
00038a  e00e              B        |L1.938|
                  |L1.908|
00038c  f44f727a          MOV      r2,#0x3e8             ;387
000390  e00b              B        |L1.938|
                  |L1.914|
000392  f2427210          MOV      r2,#0x2710            ;388
000396  e008              B        |L1.938|
                  |L1.920|
000398  4a22              LDR      r2,|L1.1060|
00039a  e006              B        |L1.938|
                  |L1.924|
00039c  4a22              LDR      r2,|L1.1064|
00039e  e004              B        |L1.938|
                  |L1.928|
0003a0  4a22              LDR      r2,|L1.1068|
0003a2  e002              B        |L1.938|
                  |L1.932|
0003a4  4a22              LDR      r2,|L1.1072|
0003a6  e000              B        |L1.938|
                  |L1.936|
0003a8  4a22              LDR      r2,|L1.1076|
                  |L1.938|
;;;394    
;;;395    base_up=base*10U;
0003aa  eb020182          ADD      r1,r2,r2,LSL #2
0003ae  ea4f0341          LSL      r3,r1,#1
;;;396    base_dn=base/10U;
0003b2  f04f040a          MOV      r4,#0xa
;;;397    
;;;398    med_dn=argument%base;
0003b6  fbb0f1f2          UDIV     r1,r0,r2
0003ba  fb020511          MLS      r5,r2,r1,r0
;;;399    med=argument/base;
;;;400    med_up=argument/base_up;
0003be  fbb0f3f3          UDIV     r3,r0,r3
;;;401    digit=med%10U;
0003c2  fbb1f0f4          UDIV     r0,r1,r4
0003c6  fb041010          MLS      r0,r4,r0,r1
;;;402    if(digit==0)digit=9;
0003ca  b150              CBZ      r0,|L1.994|
;;;403    else digit--;
0003cc  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
                  |L1.976|
;;;404    //digit%=10U;
;;;405    med_up*=10U;
0003d0  eb030183          ADD      r1,r3,r3,LSL #2
0003d4  ea4f0141          LSL      r1,r1,#1
;;;406    med_up+=digit;
0003d8  4408              ADD      r0,r0,r1
;;;407    med_up*=base;
0003da  fb00f002          MUL      r0,r0,r2
;;;408    med_up+=med_dn;
0003de  4428              ADD      r0,r0,r5
;;;409    return med_up;
;;;410    
;;;411    
;;;412    
;;;413    
;;;414    }
0003e0  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.994|
0003e2  f04f0009          MOV      r0,#9                 ;402
0003e6  e7f3              B        |L1.976|
;;;415    
                          ENDP

                  long2lcdyx_mmm PROC
;;;416    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;417    void long2lcdyx_mmm(signed long in,char y,char x,char des)
0003e8  e92d41fe          PUSH     {r1-r8,lr}
;;;418    {
;;;419    signed char i;
;;;420    char n;
;;;421    char s[10];
;;;422    char minus='+';
0003ec  f04f0c2b          MOV      r12,#0x2b
;;;423    char zero_on;
;;;424    char simb_num;
;;;425    
;;;426    if(in<0)
0003f0  2800              CMP      r0,#0
0003f2  da03              BGE      |L1.1020|
;;;427    	{
;;;428    	in=-in;
0003f4  f1c00000          RSB      r0,r0,#0
;;;429    	minus='-';
0003f8  f04f0c2d          MOV      r12,#0x2d
                  |L1.1020|
;;;430    	}
;;;431    
;;;432    for(i=0;i<10;i++)
0003fc  f04f0400          MOV      r4,#0
;;;433    	{
;;;434    	s[i]=in%10;
000400  f04f050a          MOV      r5,#0xa
000404  466f              MOV      r7,sp                 ;421
                  |L1.1030|
000406  4606              MOV      r6,r0
000408  fb90f0f5          SDIV     r0,r0,r5
00040c  fb056610          MLS      r6,r5,r0,r6
000410  553e              STRB     r6,[r7,r4]
000412  e011              B        |L1.1080|
                  |L1.1044|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer
                  |L1.1048|
                          DCD      ||dig||
                  |L1.1052|
                          DCD      zero_on
                  |L1.1056|
                          DCD      bFL2
                  |L1.1060|
                          DCD      0x000186a0
                  |L1.1064|
                          DCD      0x000f4240
                  |L1.1068|
                          DCD      0x00989680
                  |L1.1072|
                          DCD      0x05f5e100
                  |L1.1076|
                          DCD      0x3b9aca00
                  |L1.1080|
000438  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1              ;432
00043c  b264              SXTB     r4,r4                 ;432
00043e  2c0a              CMP      r4,#0xa               ;432
000440  dbe1              BLT      |L1.1030|
;;;435    	in/=10;
;;;436    	}   
;;;437    
;;;438    zero_on=1;
000442  f04f0501          MOV      r5,#1
;;;439    simb_num=0;
000446  f04f0400          MOV      r4,#0
;;;440    
;;;441    for (i=9;i>=0;i--)
00044a  f04f0009          MOV      r0,#9
;;;442    	{
;;;443    	if(zero_on&&(!s[i])&&(i>(des)))
;;;444    	     {
;;;445    	     s[i]=0x20;
00044e  f04f0620          MOV      r6,#0x20
                  |L1.1106|
000452  b145              CBZ      r5,|L1.1126|
000454  f8178000          LDRB     r8,[r7,r0]            ;443
000458  f1b80f00          CMP      r8,#0                 ;443
00045c  d103              BNE      |L1.1126|
00045e  4298              CMP      r0,r3                 ;443
000460  dd01              BLE      |L1.1126|
000462  543e              STRB     r6,[r7,r0]
000464  e008              B        |L1.1144|
                  |L1.1126|
;;;446    	     }
;;;447    	else 
;;;448    	     {
;;;449    	     s[i]=s[i]+0x30;
000466  5c3d              LDRB     r5,[r7,r0]
000468  f1050530          ADD      r5,r5,#0x30
00046c  543d              STRB     r5,[r7,r0]
;;;450    	     zero_on=0;
00046e  f04f0500          MOV      r5,#0
;;;451    	     simb_num++;
000472  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1
000476  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
                  |L1.1144|
000478  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1              ;441
00047c  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;441
00047e  2800              CMP      r0,#0                 ;441
000480  dae7              BGE      |L1.1106|
;;;452    	     }
;;;453    	 }
;;;454    	          
;;;455    if(minus=='-')	
000482  f1bc0f2d          CMP      r12,#0x2d
000486  d105              BNE      |L1.1172|
;;;456         {
;;;457         s[simb_num++]=minus; 
000488  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00048a  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1
00048e  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
000490  f807c000          STRB     r12,[r7,r0]
                  |L1.1172|
;;;458         }    
;;;459    if(des)
000494  b18b              CBZ      r3,|L1.1210|
;;;460         {
;;;461         for(i=simb_num;i>des;i--)
000496  b260              SXTB     r0,r4
000498  e007              B        |L1.1194|
                  |L1.1178|
;;;462              {
;;;463              s[i]=s[i-1];
00049a  eb070500          ADD      r5,r7,r0
00049e  f8155c01          LDRB     r5,[r5,#-1]
0004a2  543d              STRB     r5,[r7,r0]
0004a4  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1              ;461
0004a8  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;461
                  |L1.1194|
0004aa  4298              CMP      r0,r3                 ;461
0004ac  dcf5              BGT      |L1.1178|
;;;464              }
;;;465         s[des]='.';
0004ae  f04f002e          MOV      r0,#0x2e
0004b2  54f8              STRB     r0,[r7,r3]
;;;466         simb_num++;     
0004b4  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1
0004b8  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
                  |L1.1210|
;;;467         }
;;;468    	
;;;469    n=(20*y)+x;
0004ba  eb010081          ADD      r0,r1,r1,LSL #2
0004be  eb020080          ADD      r0,r2,r0,LSL #2
0004c2  b2c1              UXTB     r1,r0
;;;470    for (i=0;i<simb_num;i++)
0004c4  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
;;;471    	{
;;;472         lcd_buffer[n-i]=s[i];
0004c8  4aff              LDR      r2,|L1.2248|
0004ca  e006              B        |L1.1242|
                  |L1.1228|
0004cc  eba10500          SUB      r5,r1,r0
0004d0  5c3b              LDRB     r3,[r7,r0]
0004d2  5553              STRB     r3,[r2,r5]
0004d4  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;470
0004d8  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;470
                  |L1.1242|
0004da  42a0              CMP      r0,r4                 ;470
0004dc  dbf6              BLT      |L1.1228|
;;;473    	}
;;;474    
;;;475    
;;;476    
;;;477    }
0004de  e8bd81fe          POP      {r1-r8,pc}
;;;478    
                          ENDP

                  int2lcdyx PROC
;;;479    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;480    void int2lcdyx(unsigned short in,char y,char x,char des)
0004e2  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;481    {
0004e4  460d              MOV      r5,r1
0004e6  4616              MOV      r6,r2
0004e8  461c              MOV      r4,r3
;;;482    char i;
;;;483    char n;
;;;484    bin2bcd_int(in);
0004ea  f7fffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
;;;485    bcd2lcd_zero(des+1);
0004ee  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1
0004f0  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
0004f2  f7fffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
;;;486    i=(y*20)+x;
0004f6  eb050085          ADD      r0,r5,r5,LSL #2
0004fa  eb060080          ADD      r0,r6,r0,LSL #2
0004fe  b2c1              UXTB     r1,r0
;;;487    for (n=0;n<5;n++)
000500  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
;;;488    	{ 
;;;489    	if(n<des)
;;;490    		{
;;;491    		lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];
000504  4bf1              LDR      r3,|L1.2252|
000506  4df0              LDR      r5,|L1.2248|
                  |L1.1288|
000508  42a0              CMP      r0,r4                 ;489
00050a  d201              BCS      |L1.1296|
00050c  5c1a              LDRB     r2,[r3,r0]
00050e  546a              STRB     r2,[r5,r1]
                  |L1.1296|
;;;492    		}   
;;;493    	if((n>=des)&&(dig[n]!=0x20))
000510  d307              BCC      |L1.1314|
000512  5c1a              LDRB     r2,[r3,r0]
000514  2a20              CMP      r2,#0x20
000516  d004              BEQ      |L1.1314|
;;;494    		{
;;;495    		if(!des)lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];	
000518  b164              CBZ      r4,|L1.1332|
;;;496    		else lcd_buffer[i-1]=dig[n];
00051a  eb050601          ADD      r6,r5,r1
00051e  f8062c01          STRB     r2,[r6,#-1]
                  |L1.1314|
;;;497       		}   
;;;498    	i--;	
000522  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1
000526  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
000528  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;487
00052c  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;487
00052e  2805              CMP      r0,#5                 ;487
000530  d3ea              BCC      |L1.1288|
;;;499    	}
;;;500    }
000532  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
                  |L1.1332|
000534  546a              STRB     r2,[r5,r1]            ;495
000536  e7f4              B        |L1.1314|
;;;501    
                          ENDP

                  sub_bgnd PROC
;;;1741   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1742   void sub_bgnd(char const *adr,char xy,signed char offset)
000538  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;1743   {
00053a  4604              MOV      r4,r0
00053c  4608              MOV      r0,r1
00053e  4615              MOV      r5,r2
;;;1744   char temp;
;;;1745   temp=find(xy);
000540  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1746   
;;;1747   //ptr_ram=&lcd_buffer[find(xy)];
;;;1748   if(temp!=255)
000544  28ff              CMP      r0,#0xff
000546  d00c              BEQ      |L1.1378|
;;;1749   while (*adr)
;;;1750   	{
;;;1751   	lcd_buffer[temp+offset]=*adr++;
000548  4adf              LDR      r2,|L1.2248|
;;;1752   	temp++;
00054a  e007              B        |L1.1372|
                  |L1.1356|
00054c  eb000305          ADD      r3,r0,r5              ;1751
000550  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1              ;1751
000554  54d1              STRB     r1,[r2,r3]            ;1751
000556  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
00055a  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
                  |L1.1372|
00055c  7821              LDRB     r1,[r4,#0]            ;1749
00055e  2900              CMP      r1,#0                 ;1749
000560  d1f4              BNE      |L1.1356|
                  |L1.1378|
;;;1753       	}
;;;1754   }
000562  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;1755   
                          ENDP

                  int2lcd PROC
;;;1545   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1546   void int2lcd(unsigned short in,char xy,char des)
000564  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;1547   {
000566  460d              MOV      r5,r1
000568  4614              MOV      r4,r2
;;;1548   char i;
;;;1549   char n;
;;;1550   
;;;1551   bin2bcd_int(in);
00056a  f7fffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
;;;1552   bcd2lcd_zero(des+1);
00056e  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1
000570  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000572  f7fffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
;;;1553   i=find(xy);
000576  4628              MOV      r0,r5
000578  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1554   for (n=0;n<5;n++)
00057c  f04f0100          MOV      r1,#0
;;;1555   	{
;;;1556      	if(!des&&(dig[n]!=' '))
000580  4ad2              LDR      r2,|L1.2252|
;;;1557      		{
;;;1558      		lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];	 
000582  4dd1              LDR      r5,|L1.2248|
                  |L1.1412|
000584  b924              CBNZ     r4,|L1.1424|
000586  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]            ;1556
000588  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20              ;1556
00058a  d001              BEQ      |L1.1424|

00058e  e015              B        |L1.1468|
                  |L1.1424|
;;;1559      		}
;;;1560      	else 
;;;1561      		{
;;;1562      		if(n<des)lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];

000594  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000596  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]

                  |L1.1434|
;;;1563      		else if (n==des)
00059a  d108              BNE      |L1.1454|
;;;1564      			{
;;;1565      			lcd_buffer[i]='.';

0005a0  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
;;;1566      			lcd_buffer[i-1]=dig[n];

0005ac  e006              B        |L1.1468|
                  |L1.1454|
;;;1567      			} 
;;;1568      		else if ((n>des)&&(dig[n]!=' ')) lcd_buffer[i-1]=dig[n];

0005b0  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20
0005b2  d003              BEQ      |L1.1468|

0005b8  f8063c01          STRB     r3,[r6,#-1]
                  |L1.1468|
;;;1569      		}  
;;;1570   		
;;;1571   	i--;	
0005bc  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
0005c0  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0

0005c6  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1554
0005c8  2905              CMP      r1,#5                 ;1554
0005ca  d3db              BCC      |L1.1412|
;;;1572   	}
;;;1573   }
0005cc  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
;;;1574   
                          ENDP

                  ptr_carry PROC
;;;1783   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1784   char ptr_carry(signed int in,unsigned char modul,signed int carry)
0005ce  4410              ADD      r0,r0,r2
;;;1785   {
;;;1786   signed int tempSI;
;;;1787   tempSI=in;                                                             
;;;1788   tempSI+=carry;
;;;1789   if(tempSI<0)tempSI+=modul;
0005d0  2800              CMP      r0,#0
0005d2  da01              BGE      |L1.1496|
0005d4  4408              ADD      r0,r0,r1
0005d6  e003              B        |L1.1504|
                  |L1.1496|
;;;1790   else if(tempSI>=modul)tempSI-=modul;
0005d8  4288              CMP      r0,r1
0005da  db01              BLT      |L1.1504|
0005dc  eba00001          SUB      r0,r0,r1
                  |L1.1504|
;;;1791   
;;;1792   return (char)tempSI;
0005e0  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
;;;1793   }
0005e2  4770              BX       lr
;;;1794   
                          ENDP

                  event2ind PROC
;;;503    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;504    void event2ind(char num, char simbol)

;;;505    {
0005e8  4604              MOV      r4,r0
0005ea  460d              MOV      r5,r1
;;;506    char iii;
;;;507    char dt[4],dt_[4],dt__[4];

;;;509

0005f0  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_int

                  place2lcd PROC
;;;1333   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1334   void place2lcd(char* in,
001fca  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;1335   			char xy,
;;;1336   			char flash_pos,
;;;1337   			char flash_on)
;;;1338   {
001fcc  4604              MOV      r4,r0
001fce  4608              MOV      r0,r1
001fd0  4616              MOV      r6,r2
001fd2  461f              MOV      r7,r3
;;;1339   char temp;
;;;1340   char i,ii;
;;;1341   
;;;1342   i=find(xy);
001fd4  f7fffffe          BL       find
001fd8  4602              MOV      r2,r0
;;;1343   
;;;1344   temp=i;
001fda  4610              MOV      r0,r2
;;;1345   
;;;1346   ii=0;
001fdc  f04f0100          MOV      r1,#0
;;;1347   
;;;1348   if(temp!=255)
;;;1349   while ((*in) && (ii<19))
;;;1350   	{
;;;1351   	lcd_buffer[temp]=*in++;
001fe0  4b65              LDR      r3,|L1.8568|
001fe2  28ff              CMP      r0,#0xff              ;1348
001fe4  d109              BNE      |L1.8186|
001fe6  e00c              B        |L1.8194|
                  |L1.8168|
001fe8  541d              STRB     r5,[r3,r0]
001fea  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1
;;;1352   	temp++;
001fee  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
001ff2  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
;;;1353   	ii++;
001ff4  f1010101          ADD      r1,r1,#1
001ff8  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
                  |L1.8186|
001ffa  7825              LDRB     r5,[r4,#0]            ;1349
001ffc  b10d              CBZ      r5,|L1.8194|
001ffe  2913              CMP      r1,#0x13              ;1349
002000  d3f2              BCC      |L1.8168|
                  |L1.8194|
;;;1354   	}
;;;1355   
;;;1356   
;;;1357   
;;;1358   if((bFL2)&&(flash_on))
002002  485e              LDR      r0,|L1.8572|
002004  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; bFL2
002006  2800              CMP      r0,#0
002008  d006              BEQ      |L1.8216|
00200a  2f00              CMP      r7,#0
00200c  d004              BEQ      |L1.8216|
;;;1359   	{
;;;1360   	lcd_buffer[i+flash_pos]=95;
00200e  eb020106          ADD      r1,r2,r6
002012  f04f005f          MOV      r0,#0x5f
002016  5458              STRB     r0,[r3,r1]
                  |L1.8216|
;;;1361   	}
;;;1362   
;;;1363   }
002018  bdf0              POP      {r4-r7,pc}
;;;1364   
                          ENDP

                  community2lcd PROC
;;;1365   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1366   void community2lcd(char* in,
00201a  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;1367   			char xy,
;;;1368   			char flash_pos,
;;;1369   			char flash_on)
;;;1370   {
00201c  4604              MOV      r4,r0
00201e  4608              MOV      r0,r1
002020  4616              MOV      r6,r2
002022  461f              MOV      r7,r3
;;;1371   char temp;
;;;1372   char i;
;;;1373   //char n;
;;;1374   
;;;1375   
;;;1376   i=find(xy);
002024  f7fffffe          BL       find
002028  4602              MOV      r2,r0
;;;1377   
;;;1378   //in1=192;
;;;1379   
;;;1380   //in2=34;
;;;1381   
;;;1382   
;;;1383   
;;;1384   temp=i;
00202a  4610              MOV      r0,r2
;;;1385   
;;;1386   //ptr_ram=&lcd_buffer[find(xy)];
;;;1387   if(temp!=255)
;;;1388   while (*in)
;;;1389   	{
;;;1390   	lcd_buffer[temp]=*in++;
00202c  4d52              LDR      r5,|L1.8568|
00202e  28ff              CMP      r0,#0xff              ;1387
002030  d106              BNE      |L1.8256|
002032  e008              B        |L1.8262|
                  |L1.8244|
002034  5429              STRB     r1,[r5,r0]
002036  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1
;;;1391   	temp++;
00203a  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
00203e  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
                  |L1.8256|
002040  7821              LDRB     r1,[r4,#0]            ;1388
002042  2900              CMP      r1,#0                 ;1388
002044  d1f6              BNE      |L1.8244|
                  |L1.8262|
;;;1392       	}
;;;1393   
;;;1394   
;;;1395   
;;;1396   if((bFL2)&&(flash_on))
002046  484d              LDR      r0,|L1.8572|
002048  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; bFL2
00204a  2800              CMP      r0,#0
00204c  d006              BEQ      |L1.8284|
00204e  2f00              CMP      r7,#0
002050  d004              BEQ      |L1.8284|
;;;1397   	{
;;;1398   	lcd_buffer[i+flash_pos]=95;
002052  eb020106          ADD      r1,r2,r6
002056  f04f005f          MOV      r0,#0x5f
00205a  5468              STRB     r0,[r5,r1]
                  |L1.8284|
;;;1399   	}
;;;1400   
;;;1401   }
00205c  bdf0              POP      {r4-r7,pc}
;;;1402   
                          ENDP

                  data2lcd PROC
;;;1403   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1404   void data2lcd(	
00205e  e92d47f0          PUSH     {r4-r10,lr}
;;;1405   			short day,
;;;1406   			short month,
;;;1407   			short year,
;;;1408   			char xy,
;;;1409   			char flash_pos)
;;;1410   {
002062  4606              MOV      r6,r0
002064  460f              MOV      r7,r1
002066  4690              MOV      r8,r2
002068  4618              MOV      r0,r3
00206a  9c08              LDR      r4,[sp,#0x20]
;;;1411   char i;
;;;1412   //char n;
;;;1413   
;;;1414   //bin2bcd_int(in);
;;;1415   //bcd2lcd_zero(des+1);
;;;1416   i=find(xy);
00206c  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1417   
;;;1418   //in1=192;
;;;1419   
;;;1420   //in2=34;
;;;1421   
;;;1422   if((flash_pos==1)&&(bFL2))
002070  f8df9108          LDR      r9,|L1.8572|
;;;1423   	{
;;;1424   	lcd_buffer[i-9]=' ';
002074  2220              MOVS     r2,#0x20
;;;1425   	lcd_buffer[i-8]=' ';
;;;1426   	}
;;;1427   else 
;;;1428   	{
;;;1429   	lcd_buffer[i-9]=0x30+(day/10);
002076  250a              MOVS     r5,#0xa
002078  f8dfc0fc          LDR      r12,|L1.8568|
00207c  2c01              CMP      r4,#1                 ;1422
00207e  d108              BNE      |L1.8338|
002080  f8991000          LDRB     r1,[r9,#0]            ;1422  ; bFL2
002084  b129              CBZ      r1,|L1.8338|
002086  eb0c0100          ADD      r1,r12,r0             ;1424
00208a  f8012d09          STRB     r2,[r1,#-9]!          ;1424
00208e  704a              STRB     r2,[r1,#1]            ;1425
002090  e00d              B        |L1.8366|
                  |L1.8338|
002092  fb96f3f5          SDIV     r3,r6,r5
002096  eb0c0100          ADD      r1,r12,r0
00209a  f1030a30          ADD      r10,r3,#0x30
00209e  f801ac09          STRB     r10,[r1,#-9]
;;;1430   	lcd_buffer[i-8]=0x30+(day%10);
0020a2  fb056313          MLS      r3,r5,r3,r6
0020a6  f1030330          ADD      r3,r3,#0x30
0020aa  f8013c08          STRB     r3,[r1,#-8]
                  |L1.8366|
;;;1431   	}
;;;1432   lcd_buffer[i-7]='/';
0020ae  eb0c0300          ADD      r3,r12,r0
0020b2  f04f012f          MOV      r1,#0x2f
0020b6  f8031c07          STRB     r1,[r3,#-7]
;;;1433   
;;;1434   if((flash_pos==2)&&(bFL2))
0020ba  2c02              CMP      r4,#2
0020bc  d107              BNE      |L1.8398|
0020be  f8996000          LDRB     r6,[r9,#0]  ; bFL2
0020c2  b126              CBZ      r6,|L1.8398|
;;;1435   	{
;;;1436   	lcd_buffer[i-6]=' ';
0020c4  f8032c06          STRB     r2,[r3,#-6]
;;;1437   	lcd_buffer[i-5]=' ';
0020c8  f8032c05          STRB     r2,[r3,#-5]
0020cc  e00b              B        |L1.8422|
                  |L1.8398|
;;;1438   	}
;;;1439   else 
;;;1440   	{
;;;1441   	lcd_buffer[i-6]=0x30+(month/10);
0020ce  fb97f6f5          SDIV     r6,r7,r5
0020d2  f1060a30          ADD      r10,r6,#0x30
0020d6  f803ac06          STRB     r10,[r3,#-6]
;;;1442   	lcd_buffer[i-5]=0x30+(month%10);
0020da  fb057616          MLS      r6,r5,r6,r7
0020de  f1060630          ADD      r6,r6,#0x30
0020e2  f8036c05          STRB     r6,[r3,#-5]
                  |L1.8422|
;;;1443   	}
;;;1444   lcd_buffer[i-4]='/';
0020e6  f8031c04          STRB     r1,[r3,#-4]
;;;1445   
;;;1446   if((flash_pos==3)&&(bFL2))
0020ea  2c03              CMP      r4,#3
0020ec  d10a              BNE      |L1.8452|
0020ee  f8991000          LDRB     r1,[r9,#0]  ; bFL2
0020f2  b139              CBZ      r1,|L1.8452|
;;;1447   	{
;;;1448   	lcd_buffer[i-3]=' ';
0020f4  f8032d03          STRB     r2,[r3,#-3]!
;;;1449   	lcd_buffer[i-2]=' ';
0020f8  705a              STRB     r2,[r3,#1]
;;;1450   	lcd_buffer[i-1]=' ';
0020fa  709a              STRB     r2,[r3,#2]
;;;1451   	lcd_buffer[i]=' ';
0020fc  f80c2000          STRB     r2,[r12,r0]
                  |L1.8448|
;;;1452   	}
;;;1453   else 
;;;1454   	{
;;;1455   	lcd_buffer[i-3]='2';
;;;1456   	lcd_buffer[i-2]='0';
;;;1457   	lcd_buffer[i-1]=0x30+((year%100)/10);
;;;1458   	lcd_buffer[i]=0x30+(year%10);
;;;1459   	}
;;;1460   
;;;1461   
;;;1462   }
002100  e8bd87f0          POP      {r4-r10,pc}
                  |L1.8452|
002104  f04f0132          MOV      r1,#0x32              ;1455
002108  f8031d03          STRB     r1,[r3,#-3]!          ;1455
00210c  f04f0130          MOV      r1,#0x30              ;1456
002110  7059              STRB     r1,[r3,#1]            ;1456
002112  f04f0164          MOV      r1,#0x64              ;1457
002116  fb98f2f1          SDIV     r2,r8,r1              ;1457
00211a  fb018112          MLS      r1,r1,r2,r8           ;1457
00211e  fb91f1f5          SDIV     r1,r1,r5              ;1457
002122  f1010130          ADD      r1,r1,#0x30           ;1457
002126  7099              STRB     r1,[r3,#2]            ;1457
002128  fb98f1f5          SDIV     r1,r8,r5              ;1458
00212c  fb058111          MLS      r1,r5,r1,r8           ;1458
002130  f1010130          ADD      r1,r1,#0x30           ;1458
002134  f80c1000          STRB     r1,[r12,r0]           ;1458
002138  e7e2              B        |L1.8448|
;;;1463   
                          ENDP

                  ip2lcd PROC
;;;1464   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1465   void ip2lcd(	short in1,
00213a  e92d4ff0          PUSH     {r4-r11,lr}
;;;1466   			short in2,
;;;1467   			short in3,
;;;1468   			short in4,
;;;1469   			char xy,
;;;1470   			char flash_pos)
;;;1471   {
00213e  4607              MOV      r7,r0
002140  e9dd0509          LDRD     r0,r5,[sp,#0x24]
002144  4688              MOV      r8,r1
002146  4691              MOV      r9,r2
002148  469a              MOV      r10,r3
;;;1472   char i;
;;;1473   //char n;
;;;1474   
;;;1475   //bin2bcd_int(in);
;;;1476   //bcd2lcd_zero(des+1);
;;;1477   i=find(xy);
00214a  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1478   
;;;1479   //in1=192;
;;;1480   
;;;1481   //in2=34;
;;;1482   
;;;1483   if((flash_pos==1)&&(bFL2))
00214e  4b0b              LDR      r3,|L1.8572|
;;;1484   	{
;;;1485   	lcd_buffer[i-12]=' ';
002150  2120              MOVS     r1,#0x20
002152  4c09              LDR      r4,|L1.8568|
;;;1486   	lcd_buffer[i-13]=' ';
;;;1487   	lcd_buffer[i-14]=' ';
;;;1488   	}
;;;1489   else 
;;;1490   	{
;;;1491   	lcd_buffer[i-12]=0x30+(in1%10);
002154  220a              MOVS     r2,#0xa
;;;1492   	lcd_buffer[i-13]=0x30+(in1/10)%10;
;;;1493   	lcd_buffer[i-14]=0x30+(in1/100);
002156  f04f0c64          MOV      r12,#0x64
00215a  2d01              CMP      r5,#1                 ;1483
00215c  d110              BNE      |L1.8576|
00215e  781e              LDRB     r6,[r3,#0]            ;1483  ; bFL2
002160  b176              CBZ      r6,|L1.8576|
002162  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0              ;1485
002166  f1a6060e          SUB      r6,r6,#0xe            ;1485
00216a  70b1              STRB     r1,[r6,#2]            ;1485
00216c  7071              STRB     r1,[r6,#1]            ;1486
00216e  7031              STRB     r1,[r6,#0]            ;1487
002170  e01e              B        |L1.8624|
002172  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L1.8564|
                          DCD      sm_mont
                  |L1.8568|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer
                  |L1.8572|
                          DCD      bFL2
                  |L1.8576|
002180  fb97fbf2          SDIV     r11,r7,r2             ;1491
002184  fb027e1b          MLS      lr,r2,r11,r7          ;1491
002188  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0              ;1491
00218c  f10e0e30          ADD      lr,lr,#0x30           ;1491
002190  f806ec0c          STRB     lr,[r6,#-0xc]         ;1491
002194  fb9bfef2          SDIV     lr,r11,r2             ;1492
002198  fb02bb1e          MLS      r11,r2,lr,r11         ;1492
00219c  f10b0b30          ADD      r11,r11,#0x30         ;1492
0021a0  f806bc0d          STRB     r11,[r6,#-0xd]        ;1492
0021a4  fb97f7fc          SDIV     r7,r7,r12
0021a8  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
0021ac  f8067c0e          STRB     r7,[r6,#-0xe]
                  |L1.8624|
;;;1494   	}
;;;1495   
;;;1496   if((flash_pos==2)&&(bFL2))
0021b0  2d02              CMP      r5,#2
0021b2  d109              BNE      |L1.8648|
0021b4  781e              LDRB     r6,[r3,#0]  ; bFL2
0021b6  b13e              CBZ      r6,|L1.8648|
;;;1497   	{
;;;1498   	lcd_buffer[i-8]=' ';
0021b8  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0
0021bc  f1a6060a          SUB      r6,r6,#0xa
0021c0  70b1              STRB     r1,[r6,#2]
;;;1499   	lcd_buffer[i-9]=' ';
0021c2  7071              STRB     r1,[r6,#1]
;;;1500   	lcd_buffer[i-10]=' ';
0021c4  7031              STRB     r1,[r6,#0]
0021c6  e017              B        |L1.8696|
                  |L1.8648|
;;;1501   	}
;;;1502   else 
;;;1503   	{
;;;1504   	lcd_buffer[i-8]=0x30+(in2%10);

0021cc  fb028b17          MLS      r11,r2,r7,r8
0021d0  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0
0021d4  f1a6060a          SUB      r6,r6,#0xa
0021d8  f10b0b30          ADD      r11,r11,#0x30
0021dc  f886b002          STRB     r11,[r6,#2]
;;;1505   	lcd_buffer[i-9]=0x30+(in2/10)%10;
0021e0  fb97fbf2          SDIV     r11,r7,r2
0021e4  fb02771b          MLS      r7,r2,r11,r7
0021e8  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
0021ec  7077              STRB     r7,[r6,#1]
;;;1506   	lcd_buffer[i-10]=0x30+(in2/100);
0021ee  fb98f7fc          SDIV     r7,r8,r12
0021f2  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
0021f6  7037              STRB     r7,[r6,#0]
                  |L1.8696|
;;;1507   	}
;;;1508   
;;;1509   if((flash_pos==3)&&(bFL2))
0021f8  2d03              CMP      r5,#3
0021fa  d109              BNE      |L1.8720|
0021fc  781e              LDRB     r6,[r3,#0]  ; bFL2
0021fe  b13e              CBZ      r6,|L1.8720|
;;;1510   	{
;;;1511   	lcd_buffer[i-4]=' ';
002200  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0
002204  f1a60606          SUB      r6,r6,#6
002208  70b1              STRB     r1,[r6,#2]
;;;1512   	lcd_buffer[i-5]=' ';
00220a  7071              STRB     r1,[r6,#1]
;;;1513   	lcd_buffer[i-6]=' ';
00220c  7031              STRB     r1,[r6,#0]
00220e  e017              B        |L1.8768|
                  |L1.8720|
;;;1514   	}
;;;1515   else 
;;;1516   	{
;;;1517   	lcd_buffer[i-4]=0x30+in3%10;
002210  fb99f7f2          SDIV     r7,r9,r2
002214  fb029817          MLS      r8,r2,r7,r9
002218  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0
00221c  f1a60606          SUB      r6,r6,#6
002220  f1080830          ADD      r8,r8,#0x30
002224  f8868002          STRB     r8,[r6,#2]
;;;1518   	lcd_buffer[i-5]=0x30+(in3/10)%10;
002228  fb97f8f2          SDIV     r8,r7,r2
00222c  fb027718          MLS      r7,r2,r8,r7
002230  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
002234  7077              STRB     r7,[r6,#1]
;;;1519   	lcd_buffer[i-6]=0x30+(in3/100);
002236  fb99f7fc          SDIV     r7,r9,r12
00223a  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
00223e  7037              STRB     r7,[r6,#0]
                  |L1.8768|
;;;1520   	}
;;;1521   
;;;1522   if((flash_pos==4)&&(bFL2))
002240  2d04              CMP      r5,#4
002242  d109              BNE      |L1.8792|
002244  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]  ; bFL2
002246  b13b              CBZ      r3,|L1.8792|
;;;1523   	{
;;;1524   	lcd_buffer[i]=' ';
002248  5421              STRB     r1,[r4,r0]
;;;1525   	lcd_buffer[i-1]=' ';
00224a  4420              ADD      r0,r0,r4
00224c  f1a00002          SUB      r0,r0,#2
002250  7041              STRB     r1,[r0,#1]
;;;1526   	lcd_buffer[i-2]=' ';
002252  7001              STRB     r1,[r0,#0]
                  |L1.8788|
;;;1527   	}
;;;1528   else 
;;;1529   	{
;;;1530   	lcd_buffer[i]=0x30+in4%10;
;;;1531   	lcd_buffer[i-1]=0x30+(in4/10)%10;
;;;1532   	lcd_buffer[i-2]=0x30+(in4/100);
;;;1533   	}
;;;1534   }
002254  e8bd8ff0          POP      {r4-r11,pc}
                  |L1.8792|
002258  fb9af1f2          SDIV     r1,r10,r2             ;1530
00225c  fb02a311          MLS      r3,r2,r1,r10          ;1530
002260  f1030330          ADD      r3,r3,#0x30           ;1530
002264  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]            ;1530
002266  fb91f3f2          SDIV     r3,r1,r2              ;1531
00226a  fb021113          MLS      r1,r2,r3,r1           ;1531
00226e  4420              ADD      r0,r0,r4              ;1531
002270  f1a00002          SUB      r0,r0,#2              ;1531
002274  f1010130          ADD      r1,r1,#0x30           ;1531
002278  7041              STRB     r1,[r0,#1]            ;1531
00227a  fb9af1fc          SDIV     r1,r10,r12            ;1532
00227e  f1010130          ADD      r1,r1,#0x30           ;1532
002282  7001              STRB     r1,[r0,#0]            ;1532
002284  e7e6              B        |L1.8788|
;;;1535   
                          ENDP

                  checkboxing PROC
;;;1536   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1537   void checkboxing(char xy,short in)
002286  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;1538   {
002288  460c              MOV      r4,r1
;;;1539   char i;
;;;1540   i=find(xy);
00228a  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1541   if(in)lcd_buffer[i]=3;
00228e  49e2              LDR      r1,|L1.9752|
002290  b11c              CBZ      r4,|L1.8858|
002292  f04f0203          MOV      r2,#3
002296  540a              STRB     r2,[r1,r0]
;;;1542   else lcd_buffer[i]=4;	 
;;;1543   }
002298  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
                  |L1.8858|
00229a  f04f0204          MOV      r2,#4                 ;1542
00229e  540a              STRB     r2,[r1,r0]            ;1542
0022a0  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;1544   
                          ENDP

                  long2lcdhyx PROC
;;;1575   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1576   void long2lcdhyx(unsigned long in,char y,char x)
0022a2  b517              PUSH     {r0-r2,r4,lr}
;;;1577   {
;;;1578   char i;
;;;1579   char n;
;;;1580   
;;;1581   i=(20*y)+x;
0022a4  eb010081          ADD      r0,r1,r1,LSL #2
0022a8  eb020080          ADD      r0,r2,r0,LSL #2
0022ac  b2c2              UXTB     r2,r0
;;;1582   
;;;1583   n=*((char*)&in);
0022ae  f89d3000          LDRB     r3,[sp,#0]
;;;1584   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
0022b2  48da              LDR      r0,|L1.9756|
0022b4  f003010f          AND      r1,r3,#0xf
0022b8  5c44              LDRB     r4,[r0,r1]
0022ba  49d7              LDR      r1,|L1.9752|
0022bc  548c              STRB     r4,[r1,r2]
;;;1585   i--;
0022be  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
0022c2  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1586   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
0022c4  eb001313          ADD      r3,r0,r3,LSR #4
0022c8  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]
0022ca  548b              STRB     r3,[r1,r2]
;;;1587   i--;
0022cc  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
0022d0  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1588   
;;;1589   n=*(((char*)&in)+1);
0022d2  f89d3001          LDRB     r3,[sp,#1]
;;;1590   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
0022d6  f003040f          AND      r4,r3,#0xf
0022da  5d04              LDRB     r4,[r0,r4]
0022dc  548c              STRB     r4,[r1,r2]
;;;1591   i--;
0022de  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
0022e2  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1592   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
0022e4  eb001313          ADD      r3,r0,r3,LSR #4
0022e8  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]
0022ea  548b              STRB     r3,[r1,r2]
;;;1593   i--;
0022ec  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
0022f0  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1594   
;;;1595   n=*(((char*)&in)+2);
0022f2  f89d3002          LDRB     r3,[sp,#2]
;;;1596   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
0022f6  f003040f          AND      r4,r3,#0xf
0022fa  5d04              LDRB     r4,[r0,r4]
0022fc  548c              STRB     r4,[r1,r2]
;;;1597   i--;
0022fe  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
002302  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1598   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
002304  eb001313          ADD      r3,r0,r3,LSR #4
002308  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]
00230a  548b              STRB     r3,[r1,r2]
;;;1599   i--;
00230c  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
002310  b2d3              UXTB     r3,r2
;;;1600   
;;;1601   n=*(((char*)&in)+3);
002312  f89d2003          LDRB     r2,[sp,#3]
;;;1602   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
002316  f002040f          AND      r4,r2,#0xf
00231a  5d04              LDRB     r4,[r0,r4]
00231c  54cc              STRB     r4,[r1,r3]
;;;1603   i--;
00231e  f1a30301          SUB      r3,r3,#1
002322  b2db              UXTB     r3,r3
;;;1604   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
002324  eb001012          ADD      r0,r0,r2,LSR #4
002328  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]
00232a  54c8              STRB     r0,[r1,r3]
;;;1605   i--;
;;;1606   }
00232c  bd1e              POP      {r1-r4,pc}
;;;1607   
                          ENDP

                  char2lcdhyx PROC
;;;1621   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1622   void char2lcdhyx(char in,char y,char x)
00232e  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;1623   {
;;;1624   char i;
;;;1625   
;;;1626   i=(20*y)+x;
002330  eb010181          ADD      r1,r1,r1,LSL #2
002334  eb020181          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #2
002338  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
;;;1627   
;;;1628   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[in%16];

00233c  f000030f          AND      r3,r0,#0xf
002340  5cd4              LDRB     r4,[r2,r3]
002342  4bb5              LDR      r3,|L1.9752|
002344  545c              STRB     r4,[r3,r1]
;;;1629   i--;
002346  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1
00234a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
;;;1630   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[in/16];
00234c  eb021010          ADD      r0,r2,r0,LSR #4
002350  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]
002352  5458              STRB     r0,[r3,r1]
;;;1631   i--;
;;;1632   }
002354  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;1633   
                          ENDP

                  pointer_set PROC
;;;1679   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1680   void pointer_set(char num_of_first_row)
002356  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;1681   {
;;;1682   if(sub_ind==index_set)lcd_buffer[num_of_first_row*20]=1;
002358  49b1              LDR      r1,|L1.9760|
00235a  2401              MOVS     r4,#1
00235c  4bae              LDR      r3,|L1.9752|
00235e  f9912001          LDRSB    r2,[r1,#1]  ; a_ind
002362  f9911004          LDRSB    r1,[r1,#4]  ; a_ind
002366  428a              CMP      r2,r1
002368  d104              BNE      |L1.9076|
00236a  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2
00236e  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]
;;;1683   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+1))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+1)*20]=1;
;;;1684   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+2))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+2)*20]=1;
;;;1685   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+3))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+3)*20]=1;
;;;1686   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+4))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+4)*20]=1;
;;;1687   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+5))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+5)*20]=1;
;;;1688   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+6))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+6)*20]=1;
;;;1689   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+7))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+7)*20]=1;
;;;1690   }
002372  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.9076|
002374  1c4d              ADDS     r5,r1,#1              ;1683
002376  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1683
002378  d106              BNE      |L1.9096|
00237a  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;1683
00237e  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1683
002382  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1683
002386  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.9096|
002388  1c8d              ADDS     r5,r1,#2              ;1684
00238a  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1684
00238c  d106              BNE      |L1.9116|
00238e  f1000002          ADD      r0,r0,#2              ;1684
002392  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1684
002396  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1684
00239a  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.9116|
00239c  1ccd              ADDS     r5,r1,#3              ;1685
00239e  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1685
0023a0  d106              BNE      |L1.9136|
0023a2  f1000003          ADD      r0,r0,#3              ;1685
0023a6  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1685
0023aa  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1685
0023ae  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.9136|
0023b0  1d0d              ADDS     r5,r1,#4              ;1686
0023b2  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1686
0023b4  d106              BNE      |L1.9156|
0023b6  f1000004          ADD      r0,r0,#4              ;1686
0023ba  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1686
0023be  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1686
0023c2  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.9156|
0023c4  1d4d              ADDS     r5,r1,#5              ;1687
0023c6  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1687
0023c8  d106              BNE      |L1.9176|

0023d2  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1687
0023d6  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.9176|

0023dc  d106              BNE      |L1.9196|

0023f0  d1fb              BNE      |L1.9194|

;;;1691   
                          ENDP

                  tree_down PROC
;;;1693   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1694   void tree_down(signed char offset_ind,signed char offset_sub_ind)
002400  4b88              LDR      r3,|L1.9764|
;;;1695   {
;;;1696   ind_pointer--;
002402  881a              LDRH     r2,[r3,#0]  ; ind_pointer
002404  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
002408  b212              SXTH     r2,r2
00240a  801a              STRH     r2,[r3,#0]
;;;1697   if(ind_pointer<=0)ind_pointer=0;
00240c  2a00              CMP      r2,#0
00240e  dc02              BGT      |L1.9238|
002410  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0
002414  801a              STRH     r2,[r3,#0]
                  |L1.9238|
;;;1698   ind_pointer+=offset_ind;
002416  881a              LDRH     r2,[r3,#0]  ; ind_pointer
002418  4410              ADD      r0,r0,r2
00241a  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
00241c  8018              STRH     r0,[r3,#0]
;;;1699   a_ind=b_ind[ind_pointer];
00241e  4a82              LDR      r2,|L1.9768|
002420  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2
002424  4402              ADD      r2,r2,r0
002426  487e              LDR      r0,|L1.9760|
002428  6813              LDR      r3,[r2,#0]
00242a  6003              STR      r3,[r0,#0]  ; a_ind
00242c  7912              LDRB     r2,[r2,#4]
00242e  7102              STRB     r2,[r0,#4]
;;;1700   
;;;1701   sub_ind+=offset_sub_ind;
002430  7842              LDRB     r2,[r0,#1]  ; a_ind
002432  4411              ADD      r1,r1,r2
002434  7041              STRB     r1,[r0,#1]
;;;1702   }
002436  4770              BX       lr
;;;1703   
                          ENDP

                  tree_up PROC
;;;1704   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1705   void tree_up(char tind, char tsub_ind, char tindex_set, char tsub_ind1)
002438  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;1706   {
;;;1707   b_ind[ind_pointer++]=a_ind;
00243a  4d7a              LDR      r5,|L1.9764|
00243c  f9b54000          LDRSH    r4,[r5,#0]  ; ind_pointer
002440  f1040601          ADD      r6,r4,#1
002444  802e              STRH     r6,[r5,#0]
002446  4d78              LDR      r5,|L1.9768|
002448  eb040484          ADD      r4,r4,r4,LSL #2
00244c  4425              ADD      r5,r5,r4
00244e  4c74              LDR      r4,|L1.9760|
002450  6826              LDR      r6,[r4,#0]  ; a_ind
002452  602e              STR      r6,[r5,#0]
002454  7926              LDRB     r6,[r4,#4]  ; a_ind
002456  712e              STRB     r6,[r5,#4]
;;;1708   ind=(i_enum)tind;
002458  7020              STRB     r0,[r4,#0]
;;;1709   sub_ind=tsub_ind;
00245a  7061              STRB     r1,[r4,#1]
;;;1710   index_set=tindex_set;
00245c  7122              STRB     r2,[r4,#4]
;;;1711   sub_ind1=tsub_ind1;
00245e  70a3              STRB     r3,[r4,#2]
;;;1712   }
002460  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
;;;1713   
                          ENDP

                  bgnd_par PROC
;;;1714   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1715   void bgnd_par(char const *ptr0,char const *ptr1,char const *ptr2,char const *ptr3)
002462  e92d41f0          PUSH     {r4-r8,lr}
;;;1716   {
002466  4680              MOV      r8,r0
002468  460f              MOV      r7,r1
00246a  4616              MOV      r6,r2
;;;1717   char i,*ptr_ram;
;;;1718   clr_scrn();
00246c  f7fffffe          BL       clr_scrn
;;;1719   
;;;1720   ptr_ram=lcd_buffer;
002470  4c69              LDR      r4,|L1.9752|
;;;1721   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
002472  f04f0500          MOV      r5,#0
                  |L1.9334|
;;;1722   	{
;;;1723   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr0++;

00247a  f8040b01          STRB     r0,[r4],#1
00247e  f1050501          ADD      r5,r5,#1              ;1721
002482  b2ed              UXTB     r5,r5                 ;1721
002484  2d14              CMP      r5,#0x14              ;1721
002486  d3f6              BCC      |L1.9334|
;;;1724   	}
;;;1725   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
002488  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
                  |L1.9356|
;;;1726   	{
;;;1727   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr1++;
00248c  f8171b01          LDRB     r1,[r7],#1
002490  f8041b01          STRB     r1,[r4],#1
002494  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;1725
002498  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1725
00249a  2814              CMP      r0,#0x14              ;1725
00249c  d3f6              BCC      |L1.9356|
;;;1728   	}
;;;1729   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
00249e  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
                  |L1.9378|
;;;1730   	{
;;;1731   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr2++;
0024a2  f8161b01          LDRB     r1,[r6],#1
0024a6  f8041b01          STRB     r1,[r4],#1

0024ae  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1729
0024b0  2814              CMP      r0,#0x14              ;1729
0024b2  d3f6              BCC      |L1.9378|
;;;1732   	}
;;;1733   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
0024b4  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
                  |L1.9400|
;;;1734   	{
;;;1735   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr3++;

0024bc  f8041b01          STRB     r1,[r4],#1

0024c6  2814              CMP      r0,#0x14              ;1733
0024c8  d3f6              BCC      |L1.9400|
;;;1736   	}
;;;1737   
;;;1738   
;;;1739   }
0024ca  e8bd81f0          POP      {r4-r8,pc}
;;;1740   
                          ENDP

                  show_mess PROC
;;;1756   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1757   void show_mess(char* p1, char* p2, char* p3, char* p4,int m_sec)
0024ce  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;1758   {
0024d0  9c03              LDR      r4,[sp,#0xc]
;;;1759   //bgnd_par(p1,p2,p3,p4);
;;;1760   //tree_up(iSM,sub_ind,sub_ind1,sub_ind2);
;;;1761   //ret((char)(m_sec/100));
;;;1762   show_mess_cnt=(char)(m_sec/100);

0024d6  fb94f4f5          SDIV     r4,r4,r5
0024da  4d54              LDR      r5,|L1.9772|
0024dc  702c              STRB     r4,[r5,#0]
;;;1763   show_mess_p1=p1;
0024de  4c54              LDR      r4,|L1.9776|
0024e0  6020              STR      r0,[r4,#0]  ; show_mess_p1
;;;1764   show_mess_p2=p2;

0024e4  6001              STR      r1,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p2
;;;1765   show_mess_p3=p3;

0024e8  6002              STR      r2,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p3
;;;1766   show_mess_p4=p4;

0024ec  6003              STR      r3,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p4
;;;1767   }
0024ee  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;1768   //-----------------------------------------------
                          ENDP

                  event_data2ind PROC
;;;1795   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1796   void event_data2ind(char num, char simbol)
0024f0  e92d43fe          PUSH     {r1-r9,lr}
;;;1797   {
0024f4  460d              MOV      r5,r1
;;;1798   char iii;
;;;1799   char dt[4],dt_[4],dt__[4];
;;;1800   unsigned int tempii;    
;;;1801   		
;;;1802   /*tempii=lc640_read_int(PTR_EVENT_LOG);
;;;1803   tempii=ptr_carry(tempii,64,-1*((signed)num));*/
;;;1804   tempii=(signed)num;
;;;1805   tempii*=32;
0024f6  ea4f1040          LSL      r0,r0,#5
;;;1806   tempii+=EVENT_LOG;
0024fa  f5006080          ADD      r0,r0,#0x400
0024fe  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;1807        
;;;1808   lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii,dt);
002500  a902              ADD      r1,sp,#8
002502  4620              MOV      r0,r4
002504  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;1809   lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii+8,dt_);
002508  a901              ADD      r1,sp,#4
00250a  f1040008          ADD      r0,r4,#8
00250e  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;1810   lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii+12,dt__);
002512  4669              MOV      r1,sp
002514  f104000c          ADD      r0,r4,#0xc
002518  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;1811   
;;;1812   iii=find(simbol);
00251c  4628              MOV      r0,r5
00251e  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1813   
;;;1814   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
002522  4c3d              LDR      r4,|L1.9752|
002524  f04f0620          MOV      r6,#0x20
002528  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
00252c  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00252e  5426              STRB     r6,[r4,r0]
;;;1815   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
002530  f04f0730          MOV      r7,#0x30
002534  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
002538  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00253a  5467              STRB     r7,[r4,r1]
;;;1816   lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
00253c  f04f0821          MOV      r8,#0x21
002540  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
002544  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
002546  f8048000          STRB     r8,[r4,r0]
;;;1817   lcd_buffer[iii++]='@'; 
00254a  f04f0940          MOV      r9,#0x40
00254e  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
002552  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
002554  f8049001          STRB     r9,[r4,r1]
;;;1818   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
002558  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
00255c  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00255e  5426              STRB     r6,[r4,r0]
;;;1819   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';

002564  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
002566  5466              STRB     r6,[r4,r1]
;;;1820   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
002568  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
00256c  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00256e  5427              STRB     r7,[r4,r0]
;;;1821   lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
002570  f04f0223          MOV      r2,#0x23
002574  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
002578  b2c5              UXTB     r5,r0
00257a  5462              STRB     r2,[r4,r1]
;;;1822   int2lcd(dt_[2],'!',0);
00257c  f89d0006          LDRB     r0,[sp,#6]
002580  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0
002584  f04f0121          MOV      r1,#0x21
002588  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1823   int2lcd(dt_[0],'#',0);   
00258c  f89d0004          LDRB     r0,[sp,#4]
002590  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
002592  2123              MOVS     r1,#0x23
002594  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1824   if(!((dt_[1]>=1)&&(dt_[1]<=12)))dt_[1]=1;
002598  f89d0005          LDRB     r0,[sp,#5]
00259c  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
00259e  280c              CMP      r0,#0xc
0025a0  d303              BCC      |L1.9642|
0025a2  f04f0001          MOV      r0,#1
0025a6  f88d0005          STRB     r0,[sp,#5]
                  |L1.9642|
;;;1825   sub_bgnd(sm_mont[dt_[1]],'@',0);

0025ae  4924              LDR      r1,|L1.9792|
0025b0  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
0025b2  eb010080          ADD      r0,r1,r0,LSL #2
0025b6  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40
0025b8  f7fffffe          BL       sub_bgnd
;;;1826   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';		
0025bc  f1050001          ADD      r0,r5,#1
0025c0  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
0025c2  5566              STRB     r6,[r4,r5]
;;;1827   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
0025c4  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
0025c8  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
0025ca  5427              STRB     r7,[r4,r0]
;;;1828   lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';

0025d0  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
0025d2  f8048001          STRB     r8,[r4,r1]
;;;1829   lcd_buffer[iii++]=':'; 
0025d6  f04f023a          MOV      r2,#0x3a
0025da  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
0025de  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
0025e0  5422              STRB     r2,[r4,r0]
;;;1830   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';

0025e6  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
0025e8  5467              STRB     r7,[r4,r1]
;;;1831   lcd_buffer[iii++]='@';

0025ee  b2cd              UXTB     r5,r1
0025f0  f8049000          STRB     r9,[r4,r0]
;;;1832   int2lcd(dt__[0],'!',0);
0025f4  f89d0000          LDRB     r0,[sp,#0]
0025f8  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0
0025fc  f04f0121          MOV      r1,#0x21
002600  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1833   int2lcd(dt__[1],'@',0);
002604  f89d0001          LDRB     r0,[sp,#1]
002608  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
00260a  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40
00260c  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1834      		     		
;;;1835   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
002610  5566              STRB     r6,[r4,r5]
;;;1836   }	
002612  e8bd83fe          POP      {r1-r9,pc}
                          ENDP

002616  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L1.9752|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer
                  |L1.9756|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L1.9760|
                          DCD      a_ind
                  |L1.9764|
                          DCD      ind_pointer
                  |L1.9768|
                          DCD      b_ind
                  |L1.9772|

                          DCD      show_mess_p3
                  |L1.9788|

                  |L1.9792|
                          DCD      sm_mont

                          AREA ||area_number.2||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.2||, ||.text||
                  int2lcd_m PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  460d              MOV      r5,r1
000004  4614              MOV      r4,r2
000006  2800              CMP      r0,#0
000008  da04              BGE      |L2.20|
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  ea6f0000          MVN      r0,r0
00000e  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
000012  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
                  |L2.20|
000014  f7fffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
000018  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1
00001a  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00001c  f7fffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
000020  4628              MOV      r0,r5
000022  f7fffffe          BL       find
000026  28ff              CMP      r0,#0xff
000028  d022              BEQ      |L2.112|
00002a  f04f0100          MOV      r1,#0
00002e  4d12              LDR      r5,|L2.120|
000030  4a12              LDR      r2,|L2.124|
                  |L2.50|
000032  42a1              CMP      r1,r4
000034  d202              BCS      |L2.60|
000036  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]
000038  5413              STRB     r3,[r2,r0]
00003a  e011              B        |L2.96|
                  |L2.60|
00003c  d108              BNE      |L2.80|
00003e  f04f032e          MOV      r3,#0x2e
000042  5413              STRB     r3,[r2,r0]
000044  eb020600          ADD      r6,r2,r0
000048  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]
00004a  f8063c01          STRB     r3,[r6,#-1]
00004e  e007              B        |L2.96|
                  |L2.80|
000050  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]
000052  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20
000054  d004              BEQ      |L2.96|
000056  b164              CBZ      r4,|L2.114|
000058  eb020600          ADD      r6,r2,r0
00005c  f8063c01          STRB     r3,[r6,#-1]
                  |L2.96|
000060  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
000064  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000066  f1010101          ADD      r1,r1,#1
00006a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00006c  2905              CMP      r1,#5
00006e  d3e0              BCC      |L2.50|
                  |L2.112|
000070  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
                  |L2.114|
000072  5413              STRB     r3,[r2,r0]
000074  e7f4              B        |L2.96|
;;;17     
                          ENDP

000076  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L2.120|
                          DCD      ||dig||
                  |L2.124|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.3||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  int2lcd_mm PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  460c              MOV      r4,r1
000004  4615              MOV      r5,r2
000006  2800              CMP      r0,#0
000008  da02              BGE      |L3.16|
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  f1c00000          RSB      r0,r0,#0
00000e  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
                  |L3.16|
000010  f04f062d          MOV      r6,#0x2d
000014  f7fffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
000018  1c68              ADDS     r0,r5,#1
00001a  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00001c  f7fffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
000020  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000022  f7fffffe          BL       find
000026  f04f0100          MOV      r1,#0
00002a  4a1a              LDR      r2,|L3.148|
00002c  4c1a              LDR      r4,|L3.152|
                  |L3.46|
00002e  b97d              CBNZ     r5,|L3.80|
000030  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000032  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20
000034  d00c              BEQ      |L3.80|
000036  1857              ADDS     r7,r2,r1
000038  787f              LDRB     r7,[r7,#1]
00003a  2f20              CMP      r7,#0x20
00003c  d106              BNE      |L3.76|
00003e  2e2d              CMP      r6,#0x2d
000040  d104              BNE      |L3.76|
000042  eb040c00          ADD      r12,r4,r0
000046  4637              MOV      r7,r6
000048  f80c7c01          STRB     r7,[r12,#-1]
                  |L3.76|
00004c  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]
00004e  e017              B        |L3.128|
                  |L3.80|
000050  42a9              CMP      r1,r5
000052  d202              BCS      |L3.90|
000054  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000056  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]
000058  e012              B        |L3.128|
                  |L3.90|
00005a  d108              BNE      |L3.110|
00005c  f04f032e          MOV      r3,#0x2e
000060  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]
000062  eb040700          ADD      r7,r4,r0
000066  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000068  f8073c01          STRB     r3,[r7,#-1]
00006c  e008              B        |L3.128|
                  |L3.110|
00006e  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000070  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20
000072  d004              BEQ      |L3.126|
000074  eb040700          ADD      r7,r4,r0
000078  f8073c01          STRB     r3,[r7,#-1]
00007c  e000              B        |L3.128|
                  |L3.126|
00007e  2e2d              CMP      r6,#0x2d
                  |L3.128|
000080  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
000084  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000086  f1010101          ADD      r1,r1,#1
00008a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00008c  2905              CMP      r1,#5
00008e  d3ce              BCC      |L3.46|
000090  bdf0              POP      {r4-r7,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

000092  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L3.148|
                          DCD      ||dig||
                  |L3.152|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.4||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  char2lcdh PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
000004  4608              MOV      r0,r1
000006  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  4a07              LDR      r2,|L4.40|
00000c  f004010f          AND      r1,r4,#0xf
000010  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000012  4906              LDR      r1,|L4.44|
000014  540b              STRB     r3,[r1,r0]
000016  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
00001a  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00001c  eb021214          ADD      r2,r2,r4,LSR #4
000020  7812              LDRB     r2,[r2,#0]
000022  540a              STRB     r2,[r1,r0]
000024  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

000026  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L4.40|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L4.44|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.5||, ||.text||
                  int2lcdhyx PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  eb010181          ADD      r1,r1,r1,LSL #2
000006  eb020181          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #2
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00000c  4b0f              LDR      r3,|L5.76|
00000e  f000020f          AND      r2,r0,#0xf
000012  4c0f              LDR      r4,|L5.80|
000014  5c9a              LDRB     r2,[r3,r2]
000016  5462              STRB     r2,[r4,r1]
000018  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1
00001c  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00001e  ea4f1210          LSR      r2,r0,#4
000022  f002000f          AND      r0,r2,#0xf
000026  5c18              LDRB     r0,[r3,r0]
000028  5460              STRB     r0,[r4,r1]
00002a  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1
00002e  b2c8              UXTB     r0,r1
000030  ea4f1112          LSR      r1,r2,#4
000034  f001020f          AND      r2,r1,#0xf
000038  5c9a              LDRB     r2,[r3,r2]
00003a  5422              STRB     r2,[r4,r0]
00003c  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
000040  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000042  ea4f1111          LSR      r1,r1,#4
000046  5c59              LDRB     r1,[r3,r1]
000048  5421              STRB     r1,[r4,r0]
00004a  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

                  |L5.76|

                  |L5.80|

                  char2lcdbyx PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  eb010181          ADD      r1,r1,r1,LSL #2
000006  eb020181          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #2
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  b2cc              UXTB     r4,r1
00000c  4921              LDR      r1,|L6.148|
00000e  f0000201          AND      r2,r0,#1
000012  5c8d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r2]
000014  f1a40201          SUB      r2,r4,#1
000018  b2d3              UXTB     r3,r2
00001a  4a1f              LDR      r2,|L6.152|
00001c  5515              STRB     r5,[r2,r4]
00001e  ea4f0450          LSR      r4,r0,#1
000022  f0040001          AND      r0,r4,#1
000026  5c0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r0]
000028  f1a30001          SUB      r0,r3,#1
00002c  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00002e  54d5              STRB     r5,[r2,r3]
000030  ea4f0454          LSR      r4,r4,#1
000034  f0040301          AND      r3,r4,#1
000038  5ccd              LDRB     r5,[r1,r3]
00003a  f1a00301          SUB      r3,r0,#1
00003e  b2db              UXTB     r3,r3
000040  5415              STRB     r5,[r2,r0]
000042  ea4f0454          LSR      r4,r4,#1
000046  f0040001          AND      r0,r4,#1
00004a  5c0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r0]
00004c  f1a30001          SUB      r0,r3,#1
000050  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000052  54d5              STRB     r5,[r2,r3]
000054  ea4f0454          LSR      r4,r4,#1
000058  f0040301          AND      r3,r4,#1
00005c  5ccd              LDRB     r5,[r1,r3]
00005e  f1a00301          SUB      r3,r0,#1
000062  b2db              UXTB     r3,r3
000064  5415              STRB     r5,[r2,r0]
000066  ea4f0454          LSR      r4,r4,#1
00006a  f0040001          AND      r0,r4,#1
00006e  5c0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r0]
000070  f1a30001          SUB      r0,r3,#1
000074  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000076  54d5              STRB     r5,[r2,r3]
000078  ea4f0354          LSR      r3,r4,#1
00007c  f0030401          AND      r4,r3,#1
000080  5d0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r4]
000082  f1a00401          SUB      r4,r0,#1
000086  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
000088  5415              STRB     r5,[r2,r0]
00008a  ea4f0053          LSR      r0,r3,#1
00008e  5c08              LDRB     r0,[r1,r0]
000090  5510              STRB     r0,[r2,r4]
000092  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

                  |L6.148|

                  |L6.152|

                          AREA ||area_number.7||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.7||, ||.text||
                  show_mess_number PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  e9dd4606          LDRD     r4,r6,[sp,#0x18]
000006  9d05              LDR      r5,[sp,#0x14]
000008  f04f0764          MOV      r7,#0x64
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000c  fb95f5f7          SDIV     r5,r5,r7
000010  4f07              LDR      r7,|L7.48|
000012  703d              STRB     r5,[r7,#0]
000014  4d07              LDR      r5,|L7.52|
000016  6028              STR      r0,[r5,#0]  ; show_mess_p1
000018  4807              LDR      r0,|L7.56|
00001a  6001              STR      r1,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p2
00001c  4807              LDR      r0,|L7.60|
00001e  6002              STR      r2,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p3
000020  4807              LDR      r0,|L7.64|
000022  6003              STR      r3,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p4
000024  4807              LDR      r0,|L7.68|
000026  8004              STRH     r4,[r0,#0]
000028  4807              LDR      r0,|L7.72|
00002a  7006              STRB     r6,[r0,#0]
00002c  bdf0              POP      {r4-r7,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

00002e  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L7.48|
                          DCD      show_mess_cnt
                  |L7.52|
                          DCD      show_mess_p1
                  |L7.56|
                          DCD      show_mess_p2
                  |L7.60|
                          DCD      show_mess_p3
                  |L7.64|
                          DCD      show_mess_p4
                  |L7.68|
                          DCD      show_mess_number_
                  |L7.72|
                          DCD      show_mess_komma
